attributes.action: Increase the mileage allowance for driving business miles
attributes.additional_details: The mileage allowance hasn’t been increased since 2011, the ever increasing cost of fuel has hit record highs and the cost of running a car and keeping it road worthy has increased a lot since 2011, I think an urgent review is needed as the cost of using a car for work purposes is at a point where it is costing the car user money to do actually do their job
attributes.background: Have a review of the mileage allowance given for business use

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601286
